light heating oil - conforms to EN 590 or EN 286-03 - Sulphur Content: <0.1% S (ultra-low sulphur now mandatory in most EU markets)
A low-sulphur heavy fuel oil used mainly in industrial heating or power generation. Also complies with MARPOL Annex VI for Emission Control Areas (ECAs) in maritime sectors

High-sulphur heavy fuel oil, traditionally used in large industrial boilers, marine fuels (pre-IMO 2020), and non-ECA maritime routes. This product is increasingly regulated or taxed under decarbonization policies.
